basics.name: Jiho Jun
basics.label: Student
basics.summary:
Hello, I'm Jiho Jun from South Korea.
I'm a freshman at Seoul National University (SNU).
This blog is my personal journal where I record my studies and life experiences—so I can look back on what I've learned and thought along the way.

awards.title: 2023 KYPT(Korea Young Physicists' Tournament) Bronze Medal
2023 KOI(Korea Olympiad in Informatics) Bronze Medal

publications.name: Minimum Potential Problem at Specific Boundary Conditions
publications.summary: Numerical computations to find the n-dimensional equivalent of the catenary, as well as to explore the minimal-potential problem of two-dimensional surfaces with various boundaries.

publications.name: The Method Determining Dyson Slingshot Trajectory of a Spacecraft Following a Rectilinear Path Using Dynamic Discrete Gradient Descent
publications.publisher: Myeong Yoon, Jiho Jun et al
publications.summary: The way to find the most efficient slingshot trajectory at the binary-star system, using DDGD (Dynamic Discrete Gradient Descent).

publications.name: Solitons in a Trapped Bose-Einstein Condensate: Breathers Approaching to Stationary Solution
publications.summary: Developed Potential Growing Method from SSFM(Split-Step Fourier Method) to find the soliton solutions of the Gross-Pitaevskii equation, and the numerical computations to find the breather solutions of the equation.

publications.name: Dynamical Color Correction for Color Vision Deficiency
publications.publisher: Junseok Lee, Jiho Jun et al
publications.summary: Image re-coloring algorithm for both color vision deficiency and normal vision, using color potential model and interpolation.
